did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Five drawings by Burton Ashford Bugbee; four are in color and matted, one is black and white and not matted.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Cornell University Class of 1927, M. Arch. 1928.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Five drawings by Burton Ashford Bugbee; four are in color and matted, one is black and white and not matted.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Burton Ashford Bugbee. Architectural Renderings, #3836. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Collection consists of a single map case folder. Online guide unavailable.
